name: Key Geist
description:
As a ghost, you are only able to pick up keys, unlock cells, and rally your party around you. Rescue as many adventurers and dive as deep as you can into the dungeon maze.

My first entry into Procjam! I had the Idea for this game pretty early on, but I spent a lot of time polishing things that don't really matter. There is still a lot of balance issues, but I feel that the mechanic I was trying to communicate is clear. I'm getting better with jams, at least I finish them now (not to say I'd work on this for another week).

@crabowitz
